name: Cho for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Cho is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Caloocan, Philippines, Cho was a very shy and quiet girl. She loved reading and even try herself in writing novels. Everything has changed when her parents divorced. Cho became a rebel, she started to dye her hair in blue and purple colors and abandoned her studies. On the other side she loved her mother and didn't want to disappoint her.

Cho failed the first quarter of a class in middle school, so she made a fake report card. Cho did this every quarter that year. She forgot that they mail home the end-of-year cards, and her mom got it before she could intercept with her fake. She was PISSED—at the school for their error. The teacher also retired that year and had already thrown out his records, so they had to take Cho's mother’s “proof” (the fake ones she made throughout the year) and “correct” the “mistake.” She’s never told her mother the truth. Since that time Cho understood that she loves to live this double life. An angel at home and a devil outside. Now she want to diversify her nights. She want to become a prostitute.

Help Cho to take her place on the street!

short_description: Cho is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
